field.name: summary
field.value: Composite keys: using KeyProperty for class types (using the nhibernate key-many-to-one element)

field.name: description
field.value: I want better support for composite keys. Basically I want to use [KeyProperty] on classes (using the nhibernate key-many-to-one element). At the moment you can only use it on native types. See: http://hammett.castleproject.org/?p=87#comments

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: ActiveRecord is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/ActiveRecord/issues
